title: Econis geometric sans logo - custom font?
content:
hi, does anyone know if this is a custom work? or a font? Is there any font similar you know about?

thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328212809im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Econis_5943.gif)

 [‹ (x) Taylor Knox ornate serif - similar to P22 Numastic, Kelmscott {Isaac, Tim D}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328212809/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20046 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) What typeface is Marcelle Script based on? - Monotype Script {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328212809/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20139 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mariano

comments.content:
Could be custom, or ’one of those’ free fonts, but slightly adjusting / geometrically recreating ’ [Handel _( Gothic )_](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328212809/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1129&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=EFT0000207)’ may be a close enough alternate.

Dav
